Package jpass.data

Class EntriesRepository

java.lang.Object
jpass.data.EntriesRepository
public final class EntriesRepository
extends Object
Repository class for reading and writing (encrypted) XML documents.
Author:
Gabor_Bata

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static XmlConverter<Entries> CONVERTER
    Converter between document objects and streams representing XMLs

    File name to read/write.
    private byte[] key
    Key for encryption.

      public static EntriesRepository newInstance​(String fileName)

      a new DocumentHelper object

    • newInstance

      public static EntriesRepository newInstance​(String fileName, byte[] key)
      Creates a document repository with encryption.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file name
      key - key for encryption
      Returns:
      a new DocumentHelper object

    • readDocument

      public Entries readDocument() throws IOException, DocumentProcessException
      Reads and XML file to an Entries object.
      Returns:
      the document
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if file is not exists
      IOException - when I/O error occurred
      DocumentProcessException - when file format or password is incorrect

    • writeDocument

      public void writeDocument​(Entries document) throws DocumentProcessException, IOException
      Writes a document into an XML file.
      Parameters:
      document - the document
      Throws:
      DocumentProcessException - when document could not be saved
      IOException
